When an average college student wakes up as Ripley, an extra in her favorite romance novel, she resolves to enjoy the luxuries of her character’s status while watching the novel's plot unfold from the sidelines. However, her plans are soon derailed when she finds herself in bed with no other than Duke Zeronis, the novel’s hero! d7ad7bb1-85c0-4077-b839-42a57657a155:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d7ad7bb1-85c0-4077-b839-42a57657a155","title":{"en":"Zennou no Noa - The World of Lost Memories"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"全能のノア"},{"ja-ro":"Zennou no Noa"},{"it":"Amnesiac Kid'z"},{"fr":"Amnesia Kids"},{"ru":"Всемогущий Ноа: Мир без воспоминаний"},{"uk":"Всемогутній Ноа: Світ загублених спогадів"},{"zh":"全能的诺亚"},{"zh-hk":"全能的諾亞"},{"id":"Noah The Almighty"},{"ja":"AMNESIAC KID'z"}],"lastChapter":"16","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","en","it","uk","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"In the year 2038, a white light descended on the center of Tokyo and stole the memories of over one million people. The cause of this horrible incident was not determined, and no cure was to be found. The government formed a separate city beneath Tokyo to house and care for the victims of the incident and branded them as \"KIDz.\" Regardless of their age, they truly are like children, and they must be retaught everything they once knew. Noa Ikurumi, who lives in this isolated society, is just taking one day at a time and dreaming of finally being allowed to go back out into the world. But Noa's life will once again change drastically on the day that he is taken hostage by a terrorist with some surprising information about his identity...","pt-br":"No ano de 2038, uma luz branca veio do céu para o centro de Tóquio e roubou as memórias de mais de um milhão de pessoas. As causas deste terrível acontecimento não foram determinadas, e nenhuma cura foi encontrada. Both men are experimenting with the strange power of \"The Zetsmos,\" which is the ability to control the ghost inside the body while one is still alive. Tanaril misunderstands that Liye approached him on purpose and accuses her of approaching him to take advantage of his high status. Despite how she was offended by his accusations, she became pregnant with his child. After announcing the pregnancy through a magical letter, the two get married by contract for different reasons and purposes. She knows she shouldn't fall in love with Tanaril, since she's from a different world and all that. It'll be a piece of cake since Tanaril is a cold, distant person, right? But her expectations are ruined when she discovers that Tanaril is actually caring and warm. \n\n---\nRiye is a prophet who can see the future, and Tanaril is an ice wizard. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights’ squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!\n\n---\nA lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but she’s doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity won’t be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning \"Sir Celestine\" into his top henchman. 호위야.”\n\n남동생 대신 악역의 부하가 되었다. 내 목표는 조용히 사는 것뿐. …이었는데.\n\n“도망칠 생각하면 죽여버린다.”\n“끝까지 내 옆에 있어. 내가 황제가 될 때까지.”\n\n어찌 된 일인지 악역의 집착을 받고 있다.\n나 좀 내버려 두면 안 될까. 조용히 살고 싶다고!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** того, как Со Ынха попадает в аварию, она перевоплощается в романе «Песня Луны» и становится Селеной- старшей сестрой-близнецом второстепенного персонажа, которого ожидает смерть. Она надеется предотвратить уничтожение своей семьи. И по этому вынуждена занять место своего беглого брата Селестина, который должен был отправиться на военную службу! Після чергової аварії, повертаючись додому, Со Юрі виявила, що її перенесли в роман «Пісня місяця». Її особистістю в цьому романі була старша сестра-близнюк Селена. Доля Селени, врешті-решт, буде руйнівною, і, незважаючи на те, що вона лише побічний персонаж, вона хотіла врятувати свою сім’ю. З цієї причини вона була змушена зайняти вакансію свого брата Селестіна в лицарській ескадрильї, оскільки він вирішив втекти, не зважаючи на можливий вплив на сім’ю. Selena hy vọng sẽ ngăn chặn được sự huỷ hoại của gia đình mình, tuy nhiên, cô ấy buộc phải thế chỗ cho người anh trai bỏ trốn của mình, Celestine, trong đội hiệp sĩ! Ne se rendant pas compte de la réalité des distances à la campagne, il se retrouve perdu à 3 heures de marche de sa destination. d8779116-f000-446a-af46-cc221c0e7fc9:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d8779116-f000-446a-af46-cc221c0e7fc9","title":{"en":"Liar Game"},"altTitles":[{"tr":"Yalan Oyunu"},{"fa":"بازی دروغگو"},{"ar":"لعبة الكذب"},{"ja":"ライアーゲーム"},{"vi":"Trò chơi dối trá"}],"lastChapter":"201","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","id","pt-br","pl","es-la","he"],"relatedIdds":["b38ac8e9-ec40-44e0-8bcc-08766fa93fc7"],"description":{"en":"The card reads as follows:  \nCongratulations! You are one of the 1 in 100,000 people who has been entered in the amazing LIAR GAME TOURNAMENT!  \n  \nAlong with the postcard there is 100 million yen in notes. That's the beginning of the Liar Game. When the game ends, in 30 days, you will have to return your 100 million. If your opponent steals them, he can keep them as a prize, and you will have a debt of 100 million…","pt-br":"Nao Kanzaki, uma estudante extremamente honesta, um dia recebe um pacote contendo 100 milhõs de ienes e uma carta. Ela então descobre que faz parte do seleto grupo de 1 em cada 100.000 pessoas que foram escolhidas para participar de um jogo que pode resultar em extrema riqueza ou na desgraça total. O que define quem ganha e quem perde? Sua capacidade de enganar e manipular outras pessoas. E então qual será o desfecho deste jogo que explora os limites da psicologia humana?","vi":"Câu chuyện về Liar Game bắt đầu khi 1 tấm thiệp được gửi đến cho Kanzaki Nao, một cô gái thuộc dạng... ngây thơ cụ. Kèm với tấm thiệp bí ẩn này là 100 triệu yên. Điều đó cũng có nghĩa là: Nếu bị mất 100 triệu yên, thì bạn sẽ phải mang nợ 100 triệu. d89dec94-7772-4b1a-b65d-c4bb01e72fd7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d89dec94-7772-4b1a-b65d-c4bb01e72fd7","title":{"en":"Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Digital Colored Comics"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Rurouni Kenshin (Official Colored)"},{"ja":"るろうに剣心ー明治剣客浪漫譚ー カラー版"}],"lastChapter":"255","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","es-la"],"relatedIdds":["3112799f-b20d-4b83-b7de-b419caae6b38","4e850d21-f74a-4c6b-a07e-ffbc1d51dba9","6009d9fe-4ad4-4576-a35a-528a670b7e33","70cf0231-4ef9-42b9-800b-4e26477d7299","754a46fa-62fa-457a-bc3b-4f31bf1373d4","8311ab2d-f034-4e7a-8635-4dce27bf6027","ada4b443-7a2a-4974-862e-c66f1127413b"],"description":{"en":"Ten years have passed since the end of Bakumatsu, an era of war that saw the uprising of citizens against the Tokugawa shogunate. The revolutionaries wanted to create a time of peace, and a thriving country free from oppression. The new age of Meiji has come, but peace has not yet been achieved. Swords are banned but people are still murdered in the streets. Orphans of war veterans are left with nowhere to go, while the government seems content to just line their pockets with money.  \n  \nOne wandering samurai, Kenshin Himura, still works to make sure the values he fought for are worth the lives spent to bring about the new era. Once known as Hitokiri Battousai, he was feared as the most ruthless killer of all the revolutionaries. Now haunted by guilt, Kenshin has sworn never to kill again in atonement for the lives he took, and he may never know peace until killing is a thing of the past.  \n  \nNow in the 11th year of Meiji, Kenshin stumbles upon Kaoru Kamiya, owner and head instructor of a small dojo being threatened to close its doors. The police force is powerless to stop the string of murders done in the name of her dojo by a man claiming to be the famous Battousai. Kenshin's wanderings pause for now as he joins Kaoru to clear both their names. But how long can he stay before his past catches up to him?"},"links":{"al":"30022","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B0756ZQ2FN?ref_=dbs_s_ks_series_rwt","ap":"rurouni-kenshin"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"320831a8-4026-470b-94f6-8353740e6f04","name":{"en":"Official Colored"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

Als der rachsüchtige Prinz Jahre später einen blutigen Aufstand anzettelt, stirbt auch die junge, machtlose Prinzessin Setz durch sein Schwert. Was Setz nicht weiß, ist, dass sie fünf Jahre in der Vergangenheit in ihrem eigenen Körper wiedererwachen wird – ihre Gelegenheit, sich mit Rayton gut zu stellen und ihr Schicksal zu ändern. However, it was removed from the site with its revamps in late 2007 and early 2008. It is notable yet controversial in its lead character being a Korean and their depiction. The title derives from the word moe (lit: \"bud\", a slang term used to describe things that one has an affection for) as well as Kankoku, the Japanese word for South Korea.   \n  \nSeven strips were drawn for the comic. It is unknown if Himaruya planned to continue it or not. An early working title seen in a colored picture of Sena was Korea Mansae!.   \n   \nThe story begins with a young girl named Sena being warned by her mother that if she doesn't behave herself, the Japanese (depicted by her mother as evil and with fangs) will come and eat her. Der rote Faden ist ein Zeichen des Todes, das langsam den Körper zerstört und einen so schrittweise dem Tod näherbringt. Außer der Protagonistin des Romans ist Leann die Einzige, die diese roten Fäden sehen und entfernen kann. Als sie jedoch einen jungen Mann heilt, der verletzt auf der Straße liegt, verbindet der rote Faden des Schicksals die beiden und lässt sich nicht mehr entfernen! Zu allem Unglück ist die Person, mit der Leann nun verbunden ist, auch noch Abell, der schlimmste Bösewicht des Romans! Kann sie es schaffen, sich von ihm zu lösen und ein friedliches Leben zu leben, ohne den ursprünglichen Verlauf der Geschichte zu beeinflussen?\n\n---\nBased on the [Original Webnovel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=2573331) by Cheon Jian.\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [KToon](https://www.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10683) ([cancelled](https://twitter.com/CncRevolution/status/1313288774751666176)), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/red_thread), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/content/home/3chc0eoc4e1c), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56231270), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5770902), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968001514)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/?c=toon\u0026k=177), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/myredstringoffate), [Manta](https://manta.net/series/1276), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/346), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-red-string-of-fate)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8643/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/redline/list?title_no=2476)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/my-red-string-of-fate-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/my-red-string-of-fate-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Berhati-hatilah-Pada-Benang-Merah/3473)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/63367)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/beware-the-red-thread/list?title_no=2755)","en":"Lian has fallen into the reverse harem novel! Will she ever be able to go back home?\n\n---\nBased on the [Original Webnovel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=2573331) by Cheon Jian.\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [KToon](https://www.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10683) ([cancelled](https://twitter.com/CncRevolution/status/1313288774751666176)), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/red_thread), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/content/home/3chc0eoc4e1c), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56231270), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5770902), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968001514)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/?c=toon\u0026k=177), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/myredstringoffate), [Manta](https://manta.net/series/1276), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/346), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-red-string-of-fate), [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/my-red-string-of-fate-webtoon/495/)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8643/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/redline/list?title_no=2476)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/my-red-string-of-fate-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/my-red-string-of-fate-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Berhati-hatilah-Pada-Benang-Merah/3473)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/63367)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/beware-the-red-thread/list?title_no=2755)","fr":"Lorsqu'elle se réveille subitement dans un roman, Leann décide de mener une vie sans remous de prêtresse dans un temple où elle soigne ceux qui sont entremêlés dans les fils rouges. Ces fils rouges sont le signe d'un grave danger puisqu'ils détruisent peu à peu le corps de celui qui s'y trouve emmêlé jusqu'à finir par causer sa mort; or à part l'héroïne du roman, Leann semble être la seule à pouvoir les voir et les retirer. Mais un beau jour, alors qu'elle essaie de soigner un homme croisé au hasard dans la rue, un fil rouge du destin se forme entre lui et elle et les unit d'un lien que nul ne peut défaire. Et comme si ce n'était pas déjà un assez gros problème, il s'avère que la personne à laquelle Leann est liée, n'est autre qu'Abell, le personnage le plus horrible de l'histoire! Réussira-t-elle à lui échapper et à mener une vie calme et paisible sans changer le cours de l'histoire?\n\n---\nBased on the [Original Webnovel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=2573331) by Cheon Jian.\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [KToon](https://www.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10683) d9098d80-4b77-49e7-a3d4-326818bf38e2:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d9098d80-4b77-49e7-a3d4-326818bf38e2","title":{"en":"My Bodyguard"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"マイ・ボディガード"},{"zh":"我的任性情人"},{"zh-hk":"我的私人保鑣"}],"lastChapter":"6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"A collection of oneshots:  \n  \n1. Plan: O.N.O.  \nMisawa has fallen for the captain of the school's track team, but doesn't know if his captain feels the same way about him.  \n  \n2. Lip Service  \nKatsuhiro is the bad boy type, irritated due to his father always telling him not to make him look bad, he gets into the habit of stealing books. The only one who truly understands him is his father's secretary and his chauffeur, Yoshizaki. On the way to a celebration for his grandfather's recovery, things get a little… intense between Katsuhiro and Yoshizaki.  \n  \n3. The Lucky Star of The Night  \nShy Aoyama has a crush on his chief, Matsuzawa. After a night of a little too much drinking, Aoyama ends up at Matsuzawa's home…  \n  \n4. d930f6c9-cea6-4caa-9614-527497606991:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d930f6c9-cea6-4caa-9614-527497606991","title":{"en":"Nil Admirari no Tenbin: Teito Genwaku Kitan"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Libra of Nil Admirari"},{"en":"Nil Admirari no Tenbin"},{"en":"ニル・アドミラリの天秤"},{"en":"ニル・アドミラリの天秤 帝都幻惑綺譚"},{"en":"冷然之天秤"}],"lastChapter":"16.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"The story is set in the Taisho Era at the beginning of the 20th century — except the era did not end in 15 years (as it did in real life) but lasted 25 years. To protect her family who fell from their former glory, a girl decides to marry a man whose name she does not even know. However, before she does, her little brother commits suicide in a mysterious fire, with an old book in hand.  \n  \nThe Imperial Library Information Assets Management Bureau — also known as \"Fukurō\" — then appears before the confused girl. According to the Fukurō, there exists books called Maremono, which exert a great influence on those who read it. Moreover, the girl gained the ability to see an \"Aura\" due to the incident with her brother. Despite her confusion, the girl chooses to leave the \"birdcage\" of her former life. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.\n\n\"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here.\"\n\n\"...Milady, have you gone crazy?\"\n\n\"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement.\"\n\nBut, she didn't know then. всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)\n\n**Official English Translation of the Novel:** [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/29265), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/karinas-last-days-novel/info)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EC%97%91%EC%8A%A4%ED%8A%B8%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%8B%9C%EA%B0%84/2746), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58261408)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/karinas-last-days/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%85%8D%E8%A7%92%E7%9A%84%E5%80%92%E6%95%B8%E4%BA%BA%E7%94%9F/243)\n* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/916)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Limited-Extra-Time/73)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88153)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B3%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2/291)","uk":"Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.\nТак, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.\n\n\"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік.\"\n\"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?\"\n\"В обмін на це я розірву заручини.\"\n\nОднак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)\n\n**Official English Tenma risks his reputation and promising career to save the life of a critically wounded young boy. Unbeknownst to him, this child is destined for a terrible fate.  \n  \nA string of strange and mysterious murders begin to occur soon afterward, ones that professionally benefit Dr. Tenma, and he emerges as the primary suspect. Conspiracies, serial murders, and a scathing depiction of the underbelly of hospital politics are all masterfully woven together in this compelling manga thriller.\n\n[Official English](https://www.viz.com/monster)\n\n---\n- **Won the 46th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga**","pt-br":"Em 1986, na Alemanha Ocidental, o promissor neurocirurgião Kenzo Tenma salva um garoto, desobedecendo a ordens superiores. Ele só não imaginava que, ao fazê-lo, influenciaria a vida de inúmeras pessoas, incluindo a sua. Tenma então parte em busca do passado de seu paciente e descobre que Anna, a irmã gêmea do garoto, ainda está viva e corre grande perigo.","ru":"Один день изменил жизнь доктора Тэнмы Кэндзо, гениального японского хирурга, прибывшего в Германию для работы в госпитале «Эйслер Мемориал». В этот день он понял, что человеческие жизни равноценны, и что сама человеческая жизнь стоит больше, чем выгода, которую можно получить за её спасение. В этот день он спас мальчика, получившего огнестрельное ранение в голову во время убийства его родителей. Через некоторое время произошло ещё три убийства, и доктор Тэнма стал главой хирургического отделения госпиталя. В суматохе этих дней выживший после великолепной операции, проведённой нашим Айболитом, мальчик и его сестра-близнец бесследно исчезли из больницы.  \n  \nПрошло девять лет, и убийства в Дюссельдорфе начались вновь. Монстр появился в городе. И в жизни Тэнмы, чтобы в один дождливый вечер сказать: «Ты — тот, кто вернул меня к жизни, доктор…»","tr":"Monster, üst düzey bir hastanede gelecek vadeden bir kariyere sahip ünlü bir cerrah olan Dr. Kenzo Tenma'nın sürükleyici hikâyesidir. Kendisinin haberi yoktur ancak bu çocuk korkunç bir kadere mahkûmdur.  \n  \nKısa süre sonra, Dr. Tenma'ya profesyonel olarak fayda sağlayan bir dizi tuhaf ve gizemli cinayet meydana gelmeye başlar ve birincil şüpheli olarak ortaya çıkar. Ultraman, an immortal hero born in Japan. Mamoru Uchiyama's version of 'Ultraman', which was serialized very popularly by 'second graders' from 1971 to 1974, will be released as a full-scale book for the first time this autumn to commemorate the 45th anniversary of Tsuburaya Productions' Ultraman Series! The fourth installment is \"Ultraman Leo\" (1974)! Leo who transforms Ootori Gen, his younger brother Astra, and Ultra Seven = Moroboshi Dan who trains Gen will save the earth! Leo and the others defeat astonishing enemies one after another, such as the legendary \"Tsuruku Rider Corps\". On that day, Leo's success that the boys were heartbroken... is coming back after 37 years! The series, which was praised as \"one of the masterpieces\" among the many Ultraman comics, was only released as a convenience store comic in the mid-2000s after being published in a magazine (already sold out), and is now difficult to obtain. It became a rare work of \"phantom\", and it was eagerly desired to be published in a cohesive form. Director Shinji Higuchi is also enthusiastic! da11a95c-174b-43e1-bc28-04ff58daa515:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"da11a95c-174b-43e1-bc28-04ff58daa515","title":{"en":"Ten Ways to Get Dumped by a Tyrant"},"altTitles":[{"en":"10 Ways to Get Dumped by a Tyrant"},{"ko":"폭군에게 차이는 10가지 방법"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","en"],"description":{"en":"I became the fiancée of the tyrannous male lead. A character who becomes a villainess because of her obsession with the beautiful tyrant. It goes without saying that in the end she gets killed by the tyrant. Nevertheless, this was just in the nick of time before the original story began. After diligently performing a dozen or so actions that would cause me to get dumped by him, I succeeded in developing a healthy friendship with the tyrant ㅡ who was not as bad as I had thought.\n\n“How was it?” so, after he had seen the female lead for the first time, I asked him.\n\n“Mm?”\n\n“I’m talking about Lady Diel, Your Majesty.”\n\nHe tilted his head slightly. Aw, come on, don’t pretend you aren’t interested. It was written that you had fallen in love with her at first sight, y’know? I saw it all, y’know? \n\nFufu. I laughed and poked his arm with my finger, “Say, if you happen to find someone you particularly like, please let me know.”\n\n“Why? So you can kill her?”\n\nSheesh. Do you think I’m like you?\n\nI gave him a meaningful smile and answered him, “Well, so I can judge the right time to break off our engagement and–”\n\n“Milady.”\n\nThe smile on his face disappeared in an instant. His blazing eyes made me somehow speechless. He stared fixedly at me before letting out a slightly husky chuckle.\n\nThen, in a subdued voice, he said, “Don’t make such jokes.”\n\nThe touch of his hand gently brushing off the strand of hair on my cheek was very secretive, “Or else what would you do if I went crazy?”\n\n...And why would you go crazy over there? He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  \n  \nIn a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.","pt-br":"Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez.
